title: Each League Nation In-Game
body:
**Demacia:** A full combo will probably kill you if everything hits
**Noxus:** Extended fights will probably kill you and the rest of your team will hate you if it does kill you
**Bilgewater:** Have all at least once been considered incredibly annoying
**Piltover:** Either want to be as far away from you as possible or as close to you as possible, there is no in between
**Zaun:** It's a terrible day to be a minion
**Shadow Isles:** Incredible snowball potential due to the benefits of death
**Bandle City:** Being a meme
**Shurima:** Have been known as the best of what they do at least once
**Void:** True damage and silences (Kha is a bug in the system)
**Ionia:** #LCSPLAYS
**Mount Targon:** Chances are they are about to dive onto you
**Freljord:** JUST DIE ALREADY! (also stop slowing me)
**Celestials/God-like Beings:** 80% chance there is a way they can kill/troll their own team
**Urtistan:** {{champion:26}}

replies.body: http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/001/158/095/943.jpg

I don't mean to be nitpicky, but I'm worried that you actually think his ult is that op.

Zaun: Don't chase
{{champion:53}}: You are being baited.
{{champion:36}}:He is wasting your time, your team's time, and your tower's health.
{{champion:245}}: You're going to get stunned, ulted, or both.
{{champion:40}}: Queen of peel. It's not that you don't want to, you simply can't.
{{champion:222}}: Unless you're Vi, then it's an obligation.
{{champion:27}}: You are dying. Stop. Please. You should know this one already.
{{champion:112}}: Good at kiting, if it takes you longer than five seconds to kill him, reconsider your choices.

{{champion:29}} : He's gone in a few seconds anyway, don't waste your time
{{champion:154}} : Weeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee

Jinx just rampages through Piltover, not exactly a citizen.

Tahm is technically a resident of Bilgewater now, at least for the time being. He is a traveler whose apperance reflects his current home (hence his ratty Cajun look for Bilgewater).

Wow {{champion:150}} seems to work for both entries that can apply to him. Frejlord(ancient times) and Bandlecity(he's a yordle).
Mount Targon: Sees play as both support and at least one other form of role. No exceptions.

**Rengaria:** A passive that makes all ADCs in the game unable to cast, attack, move, or get damaged by enemies. This effect also turns their screens grey, and cannot be cleansed. This effect happens every 36.5 seconds.
